document.full_text: mr. miller and david brown started los angeles magazine, one of the nation's first city magazines, in 1960, eight years before new york magazine was first published.
document.title: geoff miller, co-founder of los angeles magazine, dies at 74
lines_and_colors: mr. miller and david brown started los angeles magazine, one of the nation's first city magazines, in 1960, eight years before new york magazine was first published.
